subsection.name: 2.4 Compiling Cayenne from Source

p.strong: JSDK1.4 must be present to compile Cayenne.

subsection.panel: Normally users don't need to build Cayenne from source. Prebuilt JAR's are included with a distribution.
subsection.p: For those users who need to recompile Cayenne (for example if they modified the source code to customize or test certain aspects), Cayenne source distribution provides Ant buildfile ([cayenne_install_dir]/src/build.xml). The result of the build is two new JAR files: [cayenne_install_dir]/lib/cayenne-cust.jar and [cayenne_install_dir]/lib/cayenne-tests-cust.jar.
